full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES PA 'DI YANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA BRGYUD KYIS GZHUNG LAS LEN PA DE NI SHIN TU SDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LA CHUNG RGYAS NAS BGYI BZHIS AER TE NI TZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA, 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR MCHOG PAR, ,SKYABS GNAS BSTAN PA SAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I, ,SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, ,BYANG CHUB 'BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYI BRIS PA LA LHAG CHAD LA SOGS PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI 'KHOR BCAS THUG DAM PAS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB KYI BAR DU LAM BZANG GI RKYEN NGAN BAR CHAD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
